snippet.title: Kawaii Kitchen - Official Trailer 🐱❤️🍔
snippet.description:
COMING SOON!

Kawaii Kitchen is a super cute cooking game for all the burger lovers out there!

Starting as an amateur cook with a small kitchen, you’ll combine ingredients from all around the world to create over 100+ different burgers. You’ll also master color theory by cleverly mixing and serving color-based milkshakes that span the color spectrum!

--

💙 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlatonicGames
💜 Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlatonicGames
❤️ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/platonicgames_

Kawaii desu ne ~~  YUMMY!! ﾐ(o*･ω･)ﾉ
